qas.question: Where is Every Nations Churches located?
What tendencies do reformed charismatics avoid?
What is a name for gifts of the Spirit?
Name the renewal movements which could be considered overemotional.

answers.text: Word of Faith, Toronto Blessing, Brownsville Revival and Lakeland Revival

context: In Congregational and Presbyterian churches which profess a traditionally Calvinist or Reformed theology there are differing views regarding present-day continuation or cessation of the gifts (<a3_0>charismata<a3_0/>) of the Spirit. Generally, however, Reformed charismatics distance themselves from renewal movements with tendencies which could be perceived as <a2_0>overemotional<a2_0/>, such as <a4_0>Word of Faith, Toronto Blessing, Brownsville Revival and Lakeland Revival<a4_0/>. Prominent Reformed charismatic denominations are the Sovereign Grace Churches and the Every Nation Churches in the <a1_0>USA<a1_0/>, in Great Britain there is the Newfrontiers churches and movement, which leading figure is <a0_0>Terry Virgo<a0_0/>.
